topicCompleted: Well done! You completed the topic.
assessmentsAssisstant: Here are all the assessments. Go click on a flower to start an assessment. Rather want to see your profile? Click on your name to go to the profile page.
topicsAssisstant: Here you can see all the topics that can be answered. If there is a red ribbon, it means you already answered the topic. For some topics you can get stars. The more stars the better! Click on a topic to start it.
profileAssisstant: This is your profile. You can see all the stars and honeypots you have gathered. If you have enough honeypots, you can unlock new avatars. Choose the avatar you like best to be on your profile.
topicAssisstant: Here is the overview of the topic. View the description carefully, before you start. Click on the green button to begin.
questionAssisstant: You see the question on top that you need to answer. Type your answer in the white field.
questionNumberLineAssisstant: You see a question on top. Drag the slider to the correct place on the numberline and press the green button
questionSelectAssisstant: On top you see the question. Below are possible answers. Choose the one that you think is correct and press the green button
questionSortPage: You need to drag the answers to the correct categories. When all the answers are in one of the categories, press the green button.
completedTopicAssisstant: "YEAEAHEAH" well done you have completed all the questions. You can be very proud of yourself!
exitInfo: If you exit now, you will be redirected to the Home page.
skipSure: Are you sure you want to skip this question?
praise1: You must have tried hard on this question!
praise4: You are doing a great job!

profile.noShopOffline: You need internet connection to access the shop!

tutorial.introduction: Hello, nice to meet you. My name is Bee. In this game you will answer questions. I will fly with you and tell you what you have to do. Let's get started.
tutorial.startQuestion: You will get some practise questions now. Click the green button
tutorial.selectQuestionTitle: On top you see the question
tutorial.selectQuestionOptions: Below are possible answers. Choose the one that you think is correct and press the green button.
tutorial.numberLineQuestionTitle: On top you see the number five.
tutorial.numberLineQuestionAnswer: Drag the slider to number five
tutorial.answerSubmit: Press the yellow button to send your answer
tutorial.starsCollection: You collect stars with correct answer
tutorial.honeypotCollection: You got a honeypot, well done! You earn honey pots when you answer questions.
tutorial.toProfilePage: Let's fly to your profile page to find out what you can do with the honeypots.
tutorial.avatarShop: With honeypots you can get new characters.
tutorial.unlockingAvatars: You can unlock a character now
tutorial.theFriendlyBee: If you dont know what to do on a page, click on me I will repeat the instruction
tutorial.end: Great work! You have finished the practise area
tutorial.redirection: Click here if you want to go to the beginning

auth.browserDisclaimer: Please use Chrome browser for a better experience

praise7: You are very good at this!
praise13: The more you try, the more you learn!
praise14: When you work on something, you get better at it!
unknownUser: Unknown username. Contact your teacher in case you forgot your code.
